item.title: Conceptual Model vs Graph Model
item.description: CREATE (ian:Person {name: "Ian"}) CREATE (alan:Person {name: "Alan"}) CREATE (gg:Person:Author {name: "Graham Greene"}) CREATE (jlc:Person:Author {name: "John Le Carre"}) CREATE (omih:Book {name: "Our Man in Havana"}) CREATE (ttsp:Book {name: "Tinker Tailor, Soldier, Spy"}) CREATE (gg)-[:WROTE]->(omih) CREATE (jlc)-[:WROTE]->(ttsp) CREATE (ian)-[:PURCHASED {date: "05-02-2011"}]->(ttsp) CREATE (ian)-[:PURCHASED {date: "08-09-2011"}]->(omih) CREATE (alan)-[:PURCHASED {date: "05-07-2014"}]->(ttsp)
